title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When I click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button in the preview, the default values of the parameters are not being displayed in the value boxes. As a result, I am unable to modify only the parameter that I want to change and have to input all the values again.
OB: When I click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button in the preview, the default values of the parameters are not being displayed in the value boxes.
EB: I expect the default values to be shown in the value boxes, so that I can easily modify the parameter that I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Preview the report.
2. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.

Expected Steps:
1. Preview the report.
2. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.

Expected Result:
- Default values should be displayed in the value boxes.
- I should be able to modify the parameter that I want to change without having to input all the values again.
